attributes.action: BBC Scotland Public Enquiry on Scottish Referendum
attributes.additional_details: BBC Scotland needs to be held to account, by public enquiry , for its overt prejudice and extremely biased coverage of the Scottish referendum, due to their indisputable support of the No Campaign and consistent attempts to thwart public news of the Yes Campaigns success reaching the License Fee Payers of Scotland. This contravenes not only the BBCs own Charter, but also broadcasting regulatory ethics and principles.
